item.title: Researchers solve riddle of plant immune system
item.description: How do plants build resilience? An international research team led by the University of Gottingen studied the molecular mechanisms of the plant immune system. They were able to show a connection between a relatively unknown gene and resistance to pathogens. The results of the study were published in the journal The Plant Cell. Scientists from "PRoTECT" -- Plant Resp
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
